title: Component Parameter
description: A dynamic component parameter that is publicly configurable.

description.description: A brief description of the parameter.

parameter_name.description: The lower_snake_case parameter name as it is declared in the component.

parameter_state_type.description: The state type of the parameter, if the value type is an encoded state.

default_value.description: The string representation of the default parameter value, or null if the parameter has no valid default value.

dynamic.description: Specify if this parameter can be dynamically reconfigured while the component is active
